**What it does**
In this function, we integrated an R package "trumpet" (Zhang *et al*., 2018, *BMC Bioinformatics*) to perform alignment quality assessment.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Inputs**
- **BAM file in IP sample**, - **BAM file in input sample** - **Genome annotation in GTF/GFF3 format**.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Outputs**
- An HTML report recording the alignment quality.
